**Example 1: 查询成功**



Input: 

```
tccli faceid CheckPhoneAndName --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Mobile 1399999999909 \
    --Name 李四
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Result": "0",
        "Description": "验证结果一致",
        "RequestId": "368a9e91-71dc-49c7-b622-c4a300ed7370"
    }
}
```
